page.title: 07How People Get To Work
page.content:
How mums and dads get to work from Beckbury,Badger,Ryton,or Kemberton. Georgina Baker and I asked everyone in our class how their mums and dads get to work.There are 25 childen. Results:How mums get to work Bike * Walk * Bus 0 Car ************
Result:How dads get to work Bike * Walk ** Bus 0 Car ********* Twelve mums go by car,1 mum walks,1 mum goes by bike,9 dads get to work by car,1 dad goes by bike,2 dads walk. Most childrens mums from this class get to work by car,and most dads get to work by car.
